description: About TikTok    TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.    Why Join Us  At TikTok, our people are humble, intelligent, compassionate and creative. We create to inspire - for you, for us, and for more than 1 billion users on our platform. We lead with curiosity and aim for the highest, never shying away from taking calculated risks and embracing ambiguity as it comes. Here, the opportunities are limitless for those who dare to pursue bold ideas that exist just beyond the boundary of possibility. Join us and make impact happen with a career at TikTok.    The User Operations team at TikTok Vietnam is the think-tank department that ensure the quality of content in our platform. The team is nurturing our ever-growing short video and livestream community by innovating partnerships, innovating trends, while leaning in local.    Responsibilities      Assisting and communicating with Vietnam Country Head of Operations in decision-making, program management, and initiative implementation    Support the user's content experience improvement through in-depth understanding of the user side, analysis of data, and suggestions on product functions, operation directions, and content creativity    Support cross-team projects with aggressive timelines and work with internal stakeholders to establish roadmaps and communicate timelines and deliverables to internal stakeholders as needed    Support, coordinate, delegate, track, and perform key project tasks from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery of project outcomes.    Facilitate day-to-day internal escalations and help troubleshoot issues     Internship Duration:   Successful candidates must be able to commit to the following timeline and duration:      Starting in Aug/Sep 2022, for at least 3 days a week, minimum 6 months duration.    Priority will be given to students who can commit Full-Time internship or for a longer duration.    Students pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Communications, Marketing, Business, and/or related courses with impeccable verbal and written communication in both English and Vietnamese    Ability to identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in data sets— advanced understanding of Microsoft Office (Excel/PowerPoint) is a plus    A committed and good team player who can work in a fast-paced environment    Strong interest in digital creators and public figures, understanding of the media landscape is a huge plus    Successful candidates must be able to commit to a full-time/part-time arrangement for at least 6 months, 3 days a week    TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
